text: 9|109|Yi byaktiye tara gharara bhitti allahara takbaraa arau santustira oparata sthapana karae si uttama, ne se'i byakti uttama yiye tara gharara bhitti sthapana karae khahi paraiba dharaa garaara kasata? Phalata i taka lai jahannamara agnita khahi paraila; arau allahe yalima sampradayaka hidayata nidiye.
